item.title: [GROOVY-249] MarkupBuilder can't reference binding variables
item.description:
MarkupBuilder doesn't appear to allow references to variables inside of markup. Test case:

import groovy.xml.MarkupBuilder

class Bean {
String b
}

t = new Bean()
t.b = "hello"
println t.b
println "test: ${t.b}"

xml = new MarkupBuilder()
root = xml.foo {
bar {
// works
baz("test")
// fails
baz(t.b)
// fails
baz("${t.b}")
}
}
